    • Method Detail

      • sortAddBucket

        public static void sortAddBucket(List<VDataBucket> buckets,
                                 VDataBucket bucket,
                                 boolean dropMultiFileIntersects,
                                 String signalQueueMode)
                          throws IOException
        Sort and Add buckets. The following rules are observed. 1. When buckets have same start time: a. Use the final bucket if one is final and the other is living; b. Use first inserted bucket if both are final; c. Use the longer end time when both are living; c. Use the smaller cycle if possible. 2. When buckets intersect but of different start/end time (complex) a. if incoming bucket is living, try to use the extra time span if it has longer end time, otherwise discard b. if incoming bucket is final and with multi-file, drop intersecting living bucket (because incoming final bucket is better)
        Parameters:
        buckets - the ordered buckets
        bucket - the incoming bucket
        dropMultiFileIntersects - when there is multiple files, drop intersecting living bucket if incoming bucket is final.
        signalQueueMode - the queue mode, can be 'last', 'first', 'all'
        Throws:
        IOException - if an exception occurs

      • updateBucketQueryRange

        public static void updateBucketQueryRange(List<VDataBucket> buckets,
                                          VDataMeta meta,
                                          String signalQueueMode,
                                          boolean queryFilter,
                                          long queryStartTime,
                                          long queryEndTime)
        Update the buckets' query range.
        Parameters:
        buckets - the list of buckets
        meta - the vdata file metadata
        signalQueueMode - the queue mode
        queryFilter - whether to apply query filter
        queryStartTime - the query filter start time
        queryEndTime - the query filter end time
